IP surveillance systems are connected to IP networks using Ethernet ports or Wi-Ficonnectivity. IP Surveillance Cameras can be recorded on a remote server or locally using a network video recorder (NVR). There are many great software's available in the market today. The leading software's are Milestone, GEOVision, Exacq Technologies, OnSSI, Honeywell, Vivotek, Video Insight, Axis, Avigilon and NUOO. Nexlar Security IP CCTV Team is equipped with the knowledge and expertise to design, sale, install and troubleshoot IP security cameras. Our Security Camera Installers are friendly and knowledgeable. Call us today or Chat with one of our experts. License plate cameras are a specialized form of surveillance cameras with integrated software and lenses that help identify and capture vehicles license plates. In conjunction with License plate recognition software LPR cameras can offer real time license plate recognition in text format that can easily be stored and sent to authorities. The software can also trigger alerts and notifications in the occasion were unauthorized entries occur. Megapixel Security cameras are the latest technology on High Definition IP network surveillance. Most Megapixel security cameras require a network video recorder (NVR) to record and manage multiple cameras. There are many benefits to high definition megapixel cameras. One of the major benefits of IP megapixel cameras is the ability to zoom in on the recorded image. Our DVR system is easy to use and scalable. All our DVRs are capable of remote viewing and Smartphone Support. With up to 5 year warranty our DVR systems are reliable and affordable.
